EmailTemplate.name: New_Project
EmailTemplate.subject: New Project {!Project__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hola,
se ha creado un nuevo proyecto con el nombre {!Project__c.Name} (https://cloudcoachers.lightning.force.com/{!Project__c.Id}) para el cliente {!Project__c.Account_Name_Formula__c}(https://cloudcoachers.lightning.force.com/{!Project__c.AccountId__c})
Saludos
